nodes.text: Xan was a male Human member of the White Maw pirate gang living during the Galactic War. In 3642 BBY he and Ki-Ta Kren were confronted at the Star of Coruscant by a bounty hunter, who sought to collect the bounty on Reneget Vause. Vause offered the Hunter to participate in the Blooding with him, and for Xan to joined his side. Kren survived the fight with the hunter, but Xan did not.
Xan appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Bounty Hunter class mission on the planet Hoth.
